events.message: I received the wrong product and I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible. This has been very inconvenient.
The case has been classified under Refund because the customer requested to return a product and obtain money back.
Our support agent John Smith has been assigned to assist with the refund request for the wrong product delivered.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the mistake?
Sure, my order number is 987654321 and I have attached a clear photo showing the wrong product I received instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a return label for you and once we receive the item back, we will process a full refund promptly.
That sounds good. I appreciate the quick response and look forward to getting this resolved. Thank you!
We have received your returned item and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund has been received and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund was successful and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case.
